mapper.sql: order_id, order_sn, product_id, create_time, order_status, user_id, shop_id, product_count, product_price, pay_method, pay_sn, pay_time, confirm_time, cancel_time, is_return, pay_money, logistics_price, discount_price, reciver_name, reciver_phone, reciver_addr, send_time, sender_id, logistics_sn, remark, update_time

o.order_id, o.order_sn, o.product_id, o.create_time, o.order_status, o.user_id, o.shop_id, o.product_count, o.product_price, o.pay_method, o.pay_sn, o.pay_time, o.confirm_time, o.cancel_time, o.is_return, o.pay_money, o.logistics_price, o.discount_price, o.reciver_name, o.reciver_phone, o.reciver_addr, o.send_time, o.sender_id, o.logistics_sn, o.remark, o.update_time, u.user_name,u.head_url
mapper.select:
select o.order_id, o.order_sn, o.product_id, o.create_time, o.order_status, o.user_id, o.shop_id, o.product_count, o.product_price, o.pay_method, o.pay_sn, o.pay_time, o.confirm_time, o.cancel_time, o.is_return, o.pay_money, o.logistics_price, o.discount_price, o.reciver_name, o.reciver_phone, o.reciver_addr, o.send_time, o.sender_id, o.logistics_sn, o.remark, o.update_time, u.user_name,u.head_url from tbl_order AS o left join user AS u on o.user_id=u.user_id where o.user_id=#{userId}
and order_status= #{orderStatus}

select o.order_id, o.order_sn, o.product_id, o.create_time, o.order_status, o.user_id, o.shop_id, o.product_count, o.product_price, o.pay_method, o.pay_sn, o.pay_time, o.confirm_time, o.cancel_time, o.is_return, o.pay_money, o.logistics_price, o.discount_price, o.reciver_name, o.reciver_phone, o.reciver_addr, o.send_time, o.sender_id, o.logistics_sn, o.remark, o.update_time, s.shop_name,s.head_url from tbl_order AS o left join tbl_shop AS s on o.shop_id=s.shop_id where o.shop_id=#{shopId}
and order_status= #{orderStatus}

select count(1)total ,sum(case when order_status=1 then 1 else 0 end)unpay_count ,sum(case when order_status=2 then 1 else 0 end) unsend_count ,sum(case when order_status=3 then 1 else 0 end) sendding_count ,sum(case when order_status=4 then 1 else 0 end) uncomment_count ,sum(case when order_status=5 then 1 else 0 end) success_count ,sum(case when order_status=6 then 1 else 0 end) cancel_count ,sum(case when order_status=7 then 1 else 0 end) delete_count from tbl_order where shop_id=#{shopId}

select
distinct
from tbl_order
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order (order_id, order_sn, product_id, create_time, order_status, user_id, shop_id, product_count, product_price, pay_method, pay_sn, pay_time, confirm_time, cancel_time, is_return, pay_money, logistics_price, discount_price, reciver_name, reciver_phone, reciver_addr, send_time, sender_id, logistics_sn, remark, update_time) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paySn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{confirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isReturn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{logisticsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discountPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reciverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reciverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reciverAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{senderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logisticsSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
